Push the Start Button on top left: When this message Press the ‘Echap’ Key for entering in the Laptop menu
In Principal Menu Apply default parameter set in factory and quit
PC will reboot and may be you'll have this message (Secure Boot). Enter the code for authorizing the change
When this message Press the ‘Echap’ Key for entering in the Laptop menu
'Enregistrer les modifications' and the Laptop will reboot
PC is restarting and you'll see the menu GiveIT ( Installation automatique par clonage). Press Enter
After a couple of technical messages , you'll have this message: Answer O for installing the system
Answer O again for installing the system
After a couple of minutes, installation will be done with that message ( Laptop will reboot …)
Let the system start. You wll that wallpaper and the box 'Bienvenue'. Installation is done
